EmailTemplate.name: NYC Impact document
EmailTemplate.subject: IAVA needs your help!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
I had a quick favor, our records indicate that you attended a NYC IAVA event in the last year. We are working with a number of NYC foundations to bring more programs to the NYC area. We'd love to hear some comments about what it means to you to be an IAVA members. We just need some brief quotes on why you are a member, what it means to be a member and what you have done with us and if it impacted you.
It doesn't have to be perfect, just how you feel about IAVA.
Please just reply to this email address if you have a story to share.
Thanks for your continued support and hope to see you at the next event.
Sincerely, Jason
Jason Hansman Membership Director Iraq and Afghanistan Veterans of America (IAVA)
